project.ModDataPath: E:/PBD_LOCAL/Misc. Mods/Level Restrictions Removal/Level Restrictions Removal/
project.Title: Level Restrictions Removal
project.ItemDescription:
[h1]WORKS WITH CRIMSON COURT[/h1] [h1]WORKS WITH COLOR OF MADNESS[/h1]
The restrictions imposed on high-level heroes is an oft debated topic. Some desire that it be removed, and that's precisely what this mod does! Feel free to send any hero anywhere you choose!
